ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: While I enjoyed the process of writing my senior essay and working with my advisor, I found the senior essay workshops disappointing. Though the structure seemed fine, there was much less participation from the cohort than I would have hoped to find among a group of majors working on their capstone projects (presumably these are the students most dedicated to the department). The workshops were structured as forums to get feedback throughout the essay process, but often students would present and be met with just one or two comments. I don't know if there is a quick fix for this, but it was sad to me that there was not a more engaged dynamic.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Its a requirement, but my thesis was the most rewarding part of my Yale experience and Im super proud of it so Id say go for it!
